title: Where is the economic activity located? - Quora

response.answer_text: The economic activity is everywhere, there is not an especifict location. The economic activity has four stages: Extraction: this is where the raw materials are acquaire, or extracted from natura.Processing and transformation: the raw materials are asent to the factories and indutries, so the turn them into more refined and elaborate products. This step can repeat, because there are many factories which transfrom materials into some product that is needed by another factory.Distribution: here you take the products from the factories to the market, or to another factories.Comecialization: This is the proper exchange activity that occurs in any market
